long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Frutyla is a lovely game you can play from your browser's new tab !
Move the fruits so that at least 3 equal ones are horizontal or vertically in a row. You can get bonus points if you can integrate the fruit bomb into a series. Controlled by touchscreen or mouse.

By installing this game, you are allowing us to modify your new tab page in order to get access to this game.
